text:
I've installed Apache v2.0.52, PHP v5.0.2 and mySQL v4.1.7

It all seems to work like a charm, but, when i enable the 'php_mysql.dll' 
extension in 'php.ini' i get a error. Apache2 don't seem to find the extension 
file ?? This happens with all extensions concerning database access ? I can 
enable every othe extension without anny flaw!

HELP!
creator: rvn2k4@aski.no
chip@force-elite.com
text:
This is a PHP error, not something todo with Apache, please see http://bugs.php.net or another User 
support arena.
